game.gfx

Class WindowManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame
      • game.gfx.WindowManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.Game, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener

    public class WindowManager
extends org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame
    WindowManager class controls the game GUI

    WindowManager loads the game states, the game container, and controls how states exit.

      • WindowManager

        public WindowManager()
        Constructor for WindowManager

        Initialises background progress and title plane progress.

        Loads states into the game.

      • closeRequested

        public boolean closeRequested()
        Closes the current window

        If currently on the main menu, this will exit the application.

        Otherwise, this will navigate back one level.

        Specified by:
        closeRequested in interface org.newdawn.slick.Game
        Overrides:
        closeRequested in class org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame
